# processador_imagens

Description. 
The processador_imagens is used to:
	Processamento
		- Histogram matching
		- Structural similarity
		- Resize image
	Utils:
		- Read image
		- Save image
		- Plot image
		- Plot result
		- Plot histogram

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install processador_imagens

```bash
pip install processador_imagens
```
